name: Elem
description:
In a world of swords and magic where people are born with affinities to specific elements, you certainly aren’t. Instead, you realize that you use a formless more primordial element.

Upon research, you recognize that what you seem to have is Source. A magick related to an ancient, now defunct, civilization. You seek out their ruins in hopes to understand your abilities better and find your roots. Instead of scripture on the wall though, you end up in a trial by combat situation. Will you survive long enough to pass the ordeal?
